page.title: 11OTTERINGTON HALL
page.content: We went to Otterington Hall.Miss Furness lives there.She has lived there since 1918.She has got 139 acres of farmland. The house and the gardens cover 4 acres.The house has 14 rooms.She does not use all the rooms.A man called Captain Boss used to own it. He was a member of parliament.There are two workers in the house.She has one gardner.There is no central heating,so nearly every room has a fireplace in it.Miss Furness breeds horses.She has ten horses,three mares,and two old horses.She breeds Shorthorn cattle.Most of the sheep are Suffolk.They have one bull.The bull does not have a ring in it's nose.We saw one cow that was calving.They have a broom plantation near the house.
